UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

id.description: The user's unique ID, matching their Firebase Auth UID.

companyName.description: The name of the company the user belongs to.

tenantId.description: The ID of the tenant (organization) the user belongs to.

name.description: The name of the tenant organization.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns/created the tenant.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information about a user.

/tenants/{tenantId}.description: Stores information about a tenant organization.
